spatial_accuracy.notes: Excellent alignment of all master walls, windows, and door openings. Individual room proportions are maintained with high precision relative to the 2D grid.

structural_fidelity.notes: The transition between the Wash Area and Toilet in the center shows slight wall-depth inconsistency compared to the line drawing, though the layout remains functional. All rooms are present.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture placement is a 1:1 match for the source layout. Scale and orientation of the dining set, kitchen appliances, and living room arrangement are correct.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Clean orthographic-style rendering. Lighting is soft and uniform, though some minor shadow artifacts are present in the corners of the staircase and toilet area.

detected_errors.description: Minor misalignment of the dividing wall between the wash area and toilet; the sink placement is slightly shifted from the original schematic.
Very slight rendering noise/artifacts in the shadowed regions of the staircase and the alcove by the bedroom door.
